name: 2D Shooter (SaryaDemir)
description:
In this game I decided to create 3 levels. To pass each level you have to kill 5 enemies. You have 3 lives in total. I modified the environment, background, enemies an players skins in each levels. I also modified the pause, next level, game lost screens as well. 

I hope you enjoy rewieving it.

Created by Sarya Demir
